name: Peckish Pigeons
description:
CHECK THE LEADERBOARD!! (Only for downloadable exe file.. maybe?)
http://gmscoreboard.com/Peckish-Pigeons

Did you know that birds love hotdogs?
Well, they do!

You have 3 rounds to get as many hotdogs as you can from those pesky customers. Might want to take a swing at that sassy vendor over there too!

:: Controls ::
Aim              - Left/Right Arrows
Charge      - Hold Space
Attack        - Space
Quit             - Escape

: : Bonus ::
Combo          - Take out more than one hotdog in a single swoop.
Easter Egg  - Look for the yellow collision. 

:: Credit ::
TM2D - Too Much 2 Do - Productions
Zachary Martin
     - Concept/Game Design
     - GFx and SFx
Steven French
     - Developer

This is our first completed game. Thank you so much for playing!
